name: Runaan's Hurricane
passive: Wind's Fury: Attacks fire bolts at 2 enemies near your target, dealing physical damage. Bolts can critically strike and apply on-hit effects.
description: Item that provides Attack Damage, Attack Speed, Ability Power. Passive effect: Attacks fire bolts at 2 enemies near your target, dealing physical damage. Bolts can critically strike and apply on-hit effects.. Great for champions looking to maximize their damage output.
tips: Great for champions who want to maximize their damage output
Synergizes well with other damage items for burst potential
Consider building this when ahead to snowball your advantage
The movement speed helps with roaming and map presence
Great for champions who need to reposition frequently in fights
